title: Somnus
description: Gay Sci-Fi Romance. When 28 year old Brendan Allnows and the rest of his family board the Somnus ship that will keep them in stasis – their bodies frozen in time for the forty-two year journey to join their colony ship - little do they know that a freak accident will change their lives forever. When he wakes in a strange, unfamiliar world, Brendan is adrift on a sea of emotion and confusion. Larcey, the dashingly handsome Prince of Trebaxia, holds Brendan's attention in a way that he can't understand and, as he's repatriated with his own people, Brendan wonders what could possibly be tying them together.But, Brendan's repatriation doesn’t go as expected; suspicion and intrigue follow him around. Lieutenant Joshua Mohl extends a hand of friendship that Brendan grasps onto but, when he's branded a spy, his life is in the balance. Somnus is a steamy M/M Sci-Fi romance with a cliffhanger ending. There is military violence that may not be suitable for everyone, and also intimate scenes not suitable for readers under 18 years of age.er 18 years of age.
author: Annya Ginger
